spiked_trap.name: Spiked Trap
spiked_trap.message: A spiked trap catches your foot and pain shoots up your leg!

crossbow_bolts.name: Crossbow Bolt Trap
crossbow_bolts.message: Several crossbow bolts fire from holes in the walls, striking you!

pit_trap.name: Pit Trap
pit_trap.message: You fall to the ground with an agonizing impact!

scything_blade.name: Scything Blade Trap
scything_blade.message: A scything blade slices into your stomach!

falling_stones.name: Falling Stone Trap
falling_stones.message: Several large stones fall on you from above!

fireball.name: Fireball Trap
fireball.message: A ball of flame explodes from an opening in the wall and engulfs you!

stone_block.name: Stone Block Trap
stone_block.message: A huge stone block slams down on you from above!

crushing_walls.name: Crushing Wall Trap
crushing_walls.message: The walls slam together, nearly maiming you!

bladed_poles.name: Bladed Pole Trap
bladed_poles.message: Rotating bladed poles tear your flesh!

stone_wheels.name: Stone Wheel Trap
stone_wheels.message: Huge stone wheels roll over you from slots in the walls!
